urlLink This calloge here is dedicated to Marilyn Vo. She ghas been such a good friend. i've known her for two years now. She's been great and we had a lot of memories together. So here i made this calloge for the memories that we shared. Last year we went to knotts and it was the best time i had with a friend. i remembered that we couldn't get in because my sister faked that she was 12 yet she was really 14 and the sacurity man damn i still remember his name (angel) Sure he's and angel. he's more like a devil. well yeah so my sister had to but another ticket fot 25 doller of which the money was for us to eat and rent a locker. but the funniest thing is that a security man told my sister to flip her shirt inside out because of what was on her shirt it said sercurity lol she she flipped it they tought that some kid would go up to her and ask for question and my sister would give the wrong answer. OMG it was hemiliating. hahah well that's all just wannah say that maralyn had been a GREAT friend!!!!!! urlLink
